content: https://twitter.com/toghrulmaharram/status/1530708903440302082?cxt=HHwWhICywefolb4qAAAA"Let me expand on the reasoning behind the 32 ETH stake size choiceThe 32 ETH stake size requirement is a compromise imposed by the messaging overhead of Gasper, the consensus mechanism utilized by Ethereum."
